about_the_game:
You awake to turbulent screams as victims of radiation have their flesh and organs decompose in front of their eyes, the seemingly unaffected form gangs who riot and pillage their way to try and take control of the area and survive this invisible hell.

Chose how to survive


Nucleite features a dynamic story driven by you, you get to chose how you want to play, if you want to escape, form a group, save people from an untimely demise or fight your way to the source of this irradiated landscape.

The more the merrier


Nucleite is a solo OR multiplayer game, you have the option to explore the mysterious land alone or with friends or even strangers, the choice is of course all yours.

Build at your own risk


Throughout the deceptively scenic landscape you can build your own base or house to use as a base camp or outpost to seek shelter from the visible and invisibly threats scattered around the place.

Fighting


In order to survive you need to fight and to do this you have an assortment of weapons you can find, customise and mercilessly kill with.

Exploration


With such a vast map you can of course explore any inch you desire but remember that you are doing so at your own risk to a deadly enemy you are unable to see

Vehicles


Because of the scale of the map there are vehicles you can find to help you on these travels, these may range from small cars to vans and even trains!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains Violence, Gore, Drug abuse and is not suitable for young ages

short_description: Awoken at night you listen to the screams of radiation victims and gangs rioting the streets for anything to survive, you have 2 options; escape or find the truth. Both are seemingly impossible and it us up to you to find out, alone or with friends.
